content: ok, thats better, except you left out the Project management platform, here is teh vision of teh Project Management Platform, this will be launched to facilitate teh collaboration around teh data from teh twin, dmp, and teh tokenization, allowing a cohesive community collaborative environment, here is teh project management platform full description, so you understand teh key features, (note, we will be building teh key collaboration and project management features to in teh project management platform to meet teh phase 1 requirements ) please rewrite the above noting this;
